entry.title: $2250 // Available Now! -- Spacious 2 BR -- Steps to Subway
entry.content:
Available Now! -- Spacious 2 BR -- Steps to Subway

Listing ID #: 169420
Price: $2,250
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 800 Sq. Ft.
Floor: 3
Pets: Case By Case

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light

Huge 2 bedroom located right off of Steinway Street and 34th Avenue. Modern eat in kitchen kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and tons of cabinets for your storage needs. Bedrooms are both equal in size and they can both fit a queen sized bed with room for extra furniture. Living room is very spacious as well. Bath is tiled floor to ceiling and features a glass vanity. Heat and hot water is included.

Contact me for a private showing today.

Shahnoor Rahman

entry.title: $2300 // Available Now! -- Tons of Sunlight -- High Ceilings -- Utilities Inclu
entry.content:
Available Now! -- Tons of Sunlight -- High Ceilings -- Utilities Included

Listing ID #: 169421
Price: $2,300
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Floor: 3
Pets: No Pets

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated
Walk In Closet

Spacious two bedroom apartment located right off if Broadway in Astoria! Featuring hardwood flooring throughout! Both bedrooms can fit a queen and have plenty of closet space and room for additional furniture. Eat-in kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and topped off with a granite counter tops. Heat & hot water is included rent!

Supermarkets, cafes, organic markets, restaurants, etc. are all located within walking distance. Manhattan is a 7 minute commute via the N & W subway lines which is located conveniently near your doorstep.

Contact me for a private viewing today!
